alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mandarin, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Nas Jax, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Baymeadows, Ortega, Lakeside and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay
